meanings.sent1: The duplexed toy car had detachable wheels.
meanings.sent2: The backpack had a duplexed design with two compartments.
meanings.sent3: The duplexed puzzle was challenging to solve with its two interconnected sections.
meanings.sent4: Her duplexed necklace symbolized the bond between mother and daughter.
meanings.sent5: The duplexed key opened both the front and back doors of the house.

meanings.definition: To make a copy of a document on both sides of a page
meanings.sent1: She duplexed the important report for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The printer duplexed the document automatically.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally duplexed the wrong page, creating a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The copier duplexed the contract flawlessly, saving paper.
meanings.sent5: Remember to duplex the form before submitting it to HR.
